items.title: ROOM 101

items.content_html:
ROOM DETAILS

This room is located on the 1st floor. They exude an aura of the old-world charm and elegance. It includes butler service and complimentary WiFi for four devices.

 
SIZE
230 Sq ft
 
SIGNATURE FEATURE
Grand architecture, spacious room and bathroom.
 
Occupancy Details
Up to 3 guests.
Max Adults: 3, Max Children: 2
 
OTHER CONVENIENCES
  • 24-hour in-room dining
  • Premium Wi-Fi at nominal charge (Complimentary for Corporate Guests)
  • Complimentary newspapers
  • Daily housekeeping & turndown service
  • 24-hour laundry service at nominal charge
  • Iron & ironing board on request at nominal charge
  • 24-hour on-call doctor & nurse at nominal charge
  • Tea-coffee availability on call
  • Complimentary WiFi
  • Telephones
  • Choice of smoking & non-smoking rooms(subject to availability)
  • Yoga kit at nominal charge
  • 40-inch flat-screen TV with satellite programmes
  • Welcome drink
  • Bottles of mineral water.
